name: Grider Portfolio
author: bah calculator

sections.description:
Description

This is a free contemporary multi-purpose responsive plugin will add a responsive Grider Portfolio in your WordPress site.

that displays a thumbnail grid expanding preview similar to the effect seen on Google Images.We have all searched images on Google,

so you probably noticed the interesting expanding preview when you click on a thumbnail. It’s a very nice effect and practical, allowing

you quickly see more details without having to reload a new page. This plugin allows you to recreate a similar effect on a thumbnail grid.

The idea is to open a preview when clicking on a thumbnail and to show a larger image and some other content like a title, a description and a link

Credits

This plugin is created by kalvasglobal and Pikashow kingmod apk download.

sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘grid-portfolio’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add some post with feature images in Grider Portfolio post type.
  4. Then use the following shortcode for showing the portfolio.
    [gid_portfolio]

Features

  • Responsive Grider Portfolio.
  • Custom post type option. You can choose your own custom post type instate of our default portfolio post type .
  • Taxonomy exclude feature.
  • Expanding preview with details
  • Smooth Scrolling
  • Portfolio image thumbnail size settings.
  • Flat and responsive Design for portfolio.
  • Shortcode System
  • All modern browser support.

Credit: Bootstrap 3.5, GRIDDER 1.4.1
